data.name: WindowTitle
data.comment: Main window title when no file is loaded

data.name: WindowTitleWithFile
data.comment: Main window title with filename. {0} = filename

data.name: LoggingWarning
data.value: WARNUNG: Sie befinden sich im Debug-Logging-Modus. Die Performance kann beeintr√§chtigt sein. Bitte entfernen Sie die --log-level Debug Option f√ºr den normalen Betrieb.
data.comment: Warning message when running in debug logging mode

data.name: LoggingWarningTitle
data.comment: Title for the debug logging warning dialog

data.name: WebView2InitError
data.comment: Error message when WebView2 initialization fails. {0} = error details

data.name: WebView2InitErrorTitle
data.comment: Title for WebView2 initialization error dialog

data.name: WebView2ProcessFailed
data.comment: Error message when WebView2 process crashes. {0} = failure reason

data.name: ErrorTitle
data.comment: Generic error dialog title

data.name: FileLoadError
data.comment: Error message when file loading fails. {0} = error details

data.name: FileNotFound
data.comment: Error message when file does not exist. {0} = filename

data.name: LinkOpenFailed
data.comment: Error message when link navigation fails. {0} = error details

data.name: AppName
data.comment: Application name used throughout the app

data.name: HelpText
data.value:
Verwendung: MarkdownViewer.exe [Datei.md] [Optionen]
Optionen: --install Installiert Windows Explorer-Integration --uninstall Deinstalliert Windows Explorer-Integration --update Sucht nach Updates --version Zeigt Versionsinformationen an --log-level [Level] Setzt das Logging-Level (Debug, Information, Warning, Error) --test-update Testet das Update-System (nur f√ºr Entwicklung) --test-scenario [Szenario] W√§hlt Test-Szenario (update-available, no-update, error) --help Zeigt diese Hilfe an
data.comment: Command-line help text shown with --help

data.name: OpenFileDialogTitle
data.comment: Title for the file open dialog

data.name: FileTypeDescription
data.comment: File type description in file open dialog

data.name: InvalidLogLevel
data.comment: Warning when invalid log level is specified. {0} = invalid level

data.name: FileNotFoundError
data.comment: Error when specified file does not exist. {0} = filename

data.name: UnknownCommandLineArgument
data.comment: Warning for unrecognized command-line arguments. {0} = argument

data.name: ExceptionOccurred
data.comment: Generic error message with exception details. {0} = exception message

data.name: UnhandledException
data.comment: Message for unhandled exceptions. {0} = exception message

data.name: InstallSuccess
data.value:
‚úÖ Windows Explorer-Integration erfolgreich installiert!
Sie k√∂nnen nun .md-Dateien mit Doppelklick √∂ffnen.
data.comment: Success message after installing file associations

data.name: InstallError
data.comment: Error message when installation fails. {0} = error details

data.name: UninstallSuccess
data.comment: Success message after uninstalling file associations

data.name: UninstallError
data.comment: Error message when uninstallation fails. {0} = error details

data.name: RegistryWriteError
data.value: Fehler beim Schreiben in die Registry: {0}
data.comment: Error when registry write operation fails. {0} = error details

data.name: UpdateAvailable
data.comment: Notification when update is available. {0} = version number

data.name: UpdateDownloaded
data.comment: Notification after successful update download

data.name: UpdateError
data.comment: Error during update check. {0} = error details

data.name: Downloading
data.comment: Status text while downloading update

data.comment: Status text while checking for updates

data.name: NoUpdateAvailable
data.value: Keine Updates verf√ºgbar. Sie verwenden die neueste Version ({0}).

data.comment: Title for no-updates dialog

data.name: UpdateCheckCompleted
data.comment: Status message when update check completes

data.name: UpdateInstalling
data.comment: Status message during update installation

data.name: UpdateInstalled
data.comment: Success message after update installation

data.name: UpdateFailed
data.comment: Error message when update fails

data.name: RateLimitExceeded
data.value: GitHub API-Limit erreicht. Bitte sp√§ter erneut versuchen.
data.comment: Error when GitHub API rate limit is exceeded

data.name: UpdateDownloadFailed
data.comment: Error when update download fails. {0} = error details
